item.title: RAPTOR: Tree-based Retrieval for Language Models
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: What is it? RAPTOR (Recursive Abstractive Processing for Tree-Organized Retrieval) is a new technique for improving retrieval-augmented language models, particularly for long documents: https://arxiv.
